医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
流行减肥药的好处和风险揭示对 Ozempic 和 Wegovy 等品牌的减肥药物的需求持续激增，最近的一项研究报告称，八分之一的美国人已经服用或正在使用这些药物来治疗糖尿病、心脏病或肥胖症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Benefits-and-risks-of-popular-weight-loss-drugs-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Benefits-and-risks-of-popular-weight-loss-drugs-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ff14cdc-da88-4e9d-b164-c5f0​​dd1e3356 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 13:36:33 -0500 Benefits and risks of popular weight-loss drugs revealed
突破性研究绘制了尼帕病毒聚合酶的关键结构哈佛医学院和波士顿大学 Chobanian & Avedisian 医学院的科学家绘制了尼帕病毒的关键组成部分，尼帕病毒是一种高度致命的蝙蝠传播病原体，自 1999 年被发现以来几乎每年都会在人类中引起疫情爆发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Breakthrough-study-maps-ritic-struct-of-Nipah-virus-polymerase.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Breakthrough-study-maps-ritic-struct-of-Nipah-virus-polymerase.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b96b4b3-d691-4a64-ad8e-bb5e99df073f Mon, 20 Jan 2025 13:33:10 -0500 Breakthrough study maps critical structure of Nipah virus polymerase
研究揭示儿童免疫系统对癌症的反应卡罗林斯卡学院和瑞典阿斯特丽德林格伦儿童医院的研究人员确定了儿童的免疫系统如何根据年龄对不同类型的癌症做出反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Study-reveals-how-childrens-immune-systems-react-to-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Study-reveals-how-childrens-immune-systems-react-to-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ee7e64e-3931-4a99-9849-9db339f37ab8 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 13:26:24 -0500 Study reveals how children's immune systems react to cancer
古代病毒DNA在早期胚胎发育中发挥着至关重要的作用我们一半以上的基因组由数千个古代病毒 DNA 残留物组成，称为转座元件，它们广泛分布在生命之树中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Ancient-viral-DNA-plays-crucial-role-in-early-embryo-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Ancient-viral-DNA-plays-crucial-role-in-early-embryo-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7662f43f-09ed-40ac-8c67-ee9785cb646d Mon, 20 Jan 2025 13:06:38 -0500 Ancient viral DNA plays crucial role in early embryo development
澳大利亚新植物品种可能彻底改变药品生产昆士兰大学多年的灌木丛搜寻和育种工作培育出了对全球制药业有价值的澳大利亚本土植物新品种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/New-Australian-plant-varieties-could-revolutionize-pharmaceutical-production.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/New-Australian-plant-varieties-could-revolutionize-pharmaceutical-production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1636619-bf42-41c0-ad21-5cf3557130b8 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 12:52:21 -0500 New Australian plant varieties could revolutionize pharmaceutical production
大脑植入物解码瘫痪患者的手指运动，从而可以玩视频游戏研究人员开发了一种脑机接口，可以解码手指运动，使瘫痪患者能够参与视频游戏和休闲活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Brain-implant-decodes-finger-movements-in-parathesis-patent-enabling-video-game-play.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Brain-implant-decodes-finger-movements-in-parathesis-patent-enabling-video-game-play.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93925963-d06c-4998-a421-5b78ca8f499c Mon, 20 Jan 2025 12:33:00 -0500 Brain implant decodes finger movements in paralysis patient, enabling video game play
研究人员创建了 GLP-1 受体激动剂健康关联图集GLP-1 受体激动剂的研究揭示了其对心脏代谢健康的益处，但对胃肠道和肌肉骨骼问题存在显着风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Researchers-create-an-atlas-of-health-associations-for-GLP-1-receptor-agonists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Researchers-create-an-atlas-of-health-associations-for-GLP-1-receptor-agonists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9db5a70-b638-4960-9692-c4eae202cc29 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 12:24:00 -0500 Researchers create an atlas of health associations for GLP-1 receptor agonists
研究探讨腰围与糖尿病患者死亡风险的联系腰围（WC）与代谢疾病密切相关，包括糖尿病（DM）、代谢综合征和死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Study-explores-waist-circumferences-link-to-mortality-risk-in-diabetic-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Study-explores-waist-circumferences-link-to-mortality-risk-in-diabetic-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4bec407-67e7-4d92-b355-463ae3acab86 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 12:08:55 -0500 Study explores waist circumference's link to mortality risk in diabetic individuals
新方法结合了两种方法来研究无序蛋白质美因茨大学和汉堡欧洲分子生物学实验室的研究人员提出了一种新方法，通过在单个样品中同时使用两种不同的方法来确定无序蛋白质的形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/New-approach-combines-two-methods-to-study-disordered- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/New-approach-combines-two-methods-to-study-disordered- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49e861f9-c963-4855-9653-f5aa36f8b480 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 11:56:57 -0500 New approach combines two methods to study disordered proteins
新的审查强调了加拿大北极地区的人畜共患感染风险一项关于加拿大北极地区人畜共患病（由动物传播的疾病）的新综述为临床医生提供了及时的指导，因为该地区受到全球关注，气候变化威胁着该地区并增加了疾病传播的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/New-review-highlights-zoonotic-infection-risks-in-the-Canadian-Arctic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/New-review-highlights-zoonotic-infection-risks-in-the-Canadian-Arctic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b2145a0-e284-4ebc-a969-6c09e0db77ec Mon, 20 Jan 2025 11:49:45 -0500 New review highlights zoonotic infection risks in the Canadian Arctic
